price: ئەگەر بىز خالىساق ئۇلارنى غەرق قىلىۋېتىمىز، ئۇلارغا ياردەم بەرگۈچىمۇ بولمايدۇ ۋە ئۇلارنى قۇتۇلدۇرغۇچىمۇ بولمايدۇ[43].
arabic: وَإِن نَّشَأۡ نُغۡرِقۡهُمۡ فَلَا صَرِيخَ لَهُمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يُنقَذُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in nasha nugh'riq'hum falā ṣarīkha lahum walā hum yunqadhūna
translations: (would be) a responder to a cry
